Desc.entry: Dance and keep fit (aerobics) classes for adults run by qualified instructors with a friendly and enthusiastic approach. Provides taster sessions, hen party sessions, courses and one-to-one tuition for wedding dances. Will visit schools (fully CRB checked). Dance styles include: Salsa, Latin American, belly dancing, Bollywood and world fusion. Also has a dance troupe for performances.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Various venues and times, please contact for details
